statements: SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData;
SELECT panel_id, location_name, efficiency_percent FROM SolarPanelData;
SELECT location_name, tilt_angle FROM SolarPanelData WHERE azimuth_angle > 180;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency_percent >= 80.00;
SELECT panel_id FROM SolarPanelData WHERE tilt_angle < 30;
SELECT location_name, azimuth_angle, tilt_angle FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency_percent > 80 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT panel_id, location_name FROM SolarPanelData WHERE tilt_angle < 30 AND azimuth_angle > 180;
SELECT panel_id, tilt_angle FROM SolarPanelData WHERE efficiency_percent < 50 AND azimuth_angle < 90 ORDER BY tilt_angle DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelData WHERE azimuth_angle BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND tilt_angle BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_percent FROM SolarPanelData WHERE location_name LIKE '%East%';
SELECT * FROM Solar_Panel_Orientation;
SELECT panel_type, orientation_angle FROM Solar_Panel_Orientation;
SELECT installation_id, installation_date, location FROM Solar_Panel_Installation;
SELECT * FROM Solar_Panel_Installation WHERE location='New York';
SELECT panel_type, efficiency_rating FROM Solar_Panel_Orientation ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Solar_Panel_Orientation;
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, orientation_angle FROM Solar_Panel_Orientation WHERE orientation_angle < 45;
SELECT installation_id, panel_id, installation_date, location FROM Solar_Panel_Installation WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT panel_type, efficiency_rating FROM Solar_Panel_Orientation WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT installation_id, panel_id, installation_date, location FROM Solar_Panel_Installation ORDER BY installation_date DESC, installation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM panel_location;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM panel_location ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT orientation, tilt_angle FROM panel_location WHERE tilt_angle > 30;
SELECT * FROM solar_energy WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT panel_id, sunlight_intensity FROM solar_energy WHERE sunlight_intensity > 0.8 ORDER BY sunlight_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM panel_location WHERE tilt_angle > 30;
SELECT panel_id, sunlight_intensity FROM solar_energy WHERE sunlight_intensity > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, optimization_date, optimized_panel_id FROM optimization_log WHERE optimized_tilt_angle < 45 AND optimized_orientation = 'south';
SELECT energy_output, timestamp FROM solar_energy WHERE panel_id = 3 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_output DESC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM panel_location WHERE orientation IN ('north', 'east', 'west') ORDER BY longitude, latitude;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_locations;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM solar_panel_locations;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT panel_id, power_output, temperature_degrees FROM solar_panel_stats ORDER BY power_output DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM solar_panel_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_locations ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM solar_panel_owners WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating, energy_output FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE energy_output > 100 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT panel_id, power_output, temperature_degrees FROM solar_panel_stats WHERE temperature_degrees BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature_degrees ASC;
SELECT s.panel_id, s.power_output, o.owner_name FROM solar_panel_stats s JOIN solar_panel_owners o ON s.panel_id = o.panel_id WHERE s.power_output > 500 ORDER BY owner_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM SunlightData WHERE sunlight_level > 0.5;
SELECT panel_id, electricity_production, production_date FROM PanelElectricity ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT panel_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM PanelMaintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE orientation = 'North' ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND orientation = 'South' ORDER BY efficiency ASC;

SELECT p.panel_name, e.electricity_production, e.production_date FROM PanelElectricity e JOIN SolarPanels p ON e.panel_id = p.id WHERE e.electricity_production > 100 ORDER BY e.electricity_production DESC;
SELECT s.sunlight_level, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM SunlightData s JOIN PanelLocation l ON s.id = l.panel_id WHERE s.sunlight_level BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7 ORDER BY l.longitude ASC;
SELECT m.*, p.panel_name FROM PanelMaintenance m JOIN SolarPanels p ON m.panel_id = p.id WHERE m.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
